translations: 东方人；居住在东部或东方的人

sentences.sentence: AN Easterner or city person who vacations on a rANch in the West.
sentences.translation: 在西部牧场度假的东部人或城里人。

sentences.sentence: It has been told by many writers. Perhaps the best-known was a young easterner, Owen Wister.
sentences.translation: 他们的故事由许多作家所描绘，也许其中最著名的是一位年轻的东方人，他叫欧文。
